summary: Email correspondence between defense attorney Laura Menninger and Assistant U.S. Attorney regarding discovery requests in the case US v. Maxwell (20 Cr. 330). The email includes an attachment related to a FOIA request and discusses legal procedures in the Ghislaine Maxwell prosecution.

keyFacts: The document shows ongoing discovery proceedings in the criminal case US v. Maxwell (20 Cr. 330) in March 2021.
Defense attorney Laura Menninger is actively requesting discovery materials from the prosecution.
The correspondence references a FOIA-related attachment (2021-03-29_Letter_Re_Discovery_Requests_Re_FOIA.pdf).
Multiple attorneys from different firms (Haddon, Morgan and Foreman; Cohen & Gresser) are involved in the Maxwell defense.
The email contains a standard confidentiality notice indicating sensitive legal communications.
